ABOUT US

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ specialty=”on” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ custom_margin=”-29px|||||” custom_padding=”9px||46px|||” fb_built=”1″ _i=”1″ _address=”1″][et_pb_column type=”3_4″ specialty_columns=”3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” _i=”0″ _address=”1.0″ custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_row_inner _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”0″ _address=”1.0.0″][et_pb_column_inner saved_specialty_column_type=”3_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”0″ _address=”1.0.0.0″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″ text_text_color=”#4c4a49″ header_font=”|700|||||||” header_text_color=”#000000″ header_2_font=”|700|||||||” header_2_text_color=”#4c4a49″ header_2_font_size=”31px” header_2_line_height=”1.4em” background_enable_image=”off” min_height=”303px” custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_padding=”10px|10px|10px|10px|false|false” _i=”0″ _address=”1.0.0.0.0″]

OVERVIEW

All In One Pest Control is the leading, full-service pest control company offering residential and commercial pest control services in Ontario, Canada. We specialize in providing control plans and treatment for bed bugs, cockroaches, flies, spiders, wasps, mice, rodents, other pests and wildlife.

We take pride in being a top-notch pest control company in Ontario, armed with all the essential licenses and certifications. Our team of friendly and knowledgeable experts is not only well-trained but also licensed, insured, and bonded to deliver top-tier pest treatments in the province of Ontario. We understand that every situation is unique, which is why we tailor our plans to suit your specific needs, budget, and preferences. Let us take care of your pest control needs with our professional and personalized approach.

At the heart of everything we do are our customers. Their satisfaction is our top priority, and we take great pride in exceeding their expectations with our exceptional services. Their happiness fuels our passion and drives us to continuously raise the bar.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column_inner][/et_pb_row_inner][et_pb_row_inner column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ use_custom_gutter=”on” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ width=”100%” min_height=”237px” custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_padding=”|10px||10px|false|false” animation_style=”fade” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ box_shadow_color=”#a0a0a0″ _i=”1″ _address=”1.0.1″][et_pb_column_inner type=”1_3″ saved_specialty_column_type=”3_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”0″ _address=”1.0.1.0″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″ header_3_font=”|700|||||||” header_3_text_align=”center” header_3_text_color=”#4c4a49″ header_3_font_size=”18px” header_6_font_size=”23px” header_6_line_height=”1.6em” custom_padding=”3px|||||” _i=”0″ _address=”1.0.1.0.0″]

OUR MISSION

To offer reliable, high-quality, safe, and environmentally friendly pest control services with care and professionalism. We also aim to exceed your expectations.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column_inner][et_pb_column_inner type=”1_3″ saved_specialty_column_type=”3_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”1″ _address=”1.0.1.1″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″ header_3_font=”|700|||||||” header_3_text_align=”center” header_3_text_color=”#4c4a49″ header_3_font_size=”18px” header_6_font_size=”23px” header_6_line_height=”1.4em” custom_padding=”3px||0px|||” _i=”0″ _address=”1.0.1.1.0″]

OUR VISION

We strive to become the number one provider of safe, effective and innovative pest control services, methods, and strategies in Canada.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column_inner][et_pb_column_inner type=”1_3″ saved_specialty_column_type=”3_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”2″ _address=”1.0.1.2″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″ header_3_font=”|700|||||||” header_3_text_align=”center” header_3_text_color=”#4c4a49″ header_3_font_size=”18px” header_6_font_size=”23px” header_6_line_height=”1.3em” custom_padding=”3px|||||” _i=”0″ _address=”1.0.1.2.0″]

OUR GOALS

We aim to offer quality services that give you complete peace of mind every time. We are bent on helping you eradicate pests from your home and business at affordable prices.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column_inner][/et_pb_row_inner][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” _i=”1″ _address=”1.1″ custom_padding__hover=”|||”][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ custom_margin=”||-217px||false|false” custom_padding=”||200px||false|false” fb_built=”1″ _i=”2″ _address=”2″][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”0″ _address=”2.0″][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”0″ _address=”2.0.0″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″ text_text_color=”#4c4a49″ header_font=”|700|||||||” header_text_color=”#000000″ header_2_font=”|700|||||||” header_2_text_color=”#4c4a49″ header_2_font_size=”31px” header_2_line_height=”1.4em” background_enable_image=”off” custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_padding=”10px|10px|10px|10px|false|false” _i=”0″ _address=”2.0.0.0″]

WORKING PROCESS

STEP 1: INITIAL CHECKING

Our pest control expert will conduct a thorough inspection of your building to assess the extent of pest infestation. We will also inspect for concealed harborage areas as well as entry and exit points.

STEP 2: IDENTIFY PEST

Our technicians are familiar with the pests that trouble homes and offices in the Ontario area. We’ll identify the pests bugging your facility and based on our findings, work out the most suitable program that will lead to the extermination of pests from your facility.

STEP 3: IMPLEMENT SOLUTIONS

Finally, after your approval, we’ll implement the pest control and prevention program. This might include chemical application, heat treatment, steam treatment entry and exit point sealing and other methods and techniques. We’ll also pay a follow-up visit and ensure that you are completely satisfied with our services.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”1″ _address=”2.0.1″][et_pb_image src=”https://aiopestcontrol.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/guy.png” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ animation_style=”fade” _i=”0″ _address=”2.0.1.0″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ fb_built=”1″ _i=”3″ _address=”3″][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”0″ _address=”3.0″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”0″ _address=”3.0.0″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”0″ _address=”3.0.0.0″][/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ custom_margin=”||-4px||false|false” custom_padding=”||6px||false|false” fb_built=”1″ _i=”4″ _address=”4″][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”0″ _address=”4.0″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”0″ _address=”4.0.0″][et_pb_code _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”0″ _address=”4.0.0.0″]

All In One Pest Control - Pest Control in Toronto
5.0
Based on 62 reviews
review us on
Gagandeep singh
05:17 05 Oct 24
I recently had a bedbug infestation in my home and turned to All-in-One Pest Control for help. I’m so glad I did! From the moment I called, the customer service was outstanding. The staff was friendly, empathetic, and took the time to explain the entire process, which eased my concerns. The technicians arrived on time and were incredibly knowledgeable. They conducted a thorough inspection of my bedroom and living areas, explaining what they were looking for and how they would treat the problem. They used a combination of heat treatment and chemical solutions, and the results were impressive. After the initial treatment, I didn’t see any signs of bedbugs, and a follow-up visit confirmed that the problem was fully resolved.They provided clear instructions on how to prepare my home for treatment, which was very helpful. The follow-up appointments were also scheduled promptly to ensure everything was on track.The pricing was reasonable, especially given the quality of service. They offered a few different packages, which made it easier to find a solution that fit my budget. I can recommend All-in-One Pest Control highly enough for bedbug issues. Their professionalism, expertise, and commitment to customer satisfaction made a stressful situation much easier to handle. If you’re dealing with bedbugs, they are the team to call!
Jasleen Tatla
12:43 04 Oct 24
I had a fantastic experience with the pest control service. The technician (Jessy) arrived early in the morning, just as we requested, which was a huge relief since we feel uneasy at night. He was incredibly responsive, answering my call on the first ring, and his expertise was evident. The service provided was top-notch, and I felt reassured throughout the process. Highly recommend for anyone needing pest control.
Yogita
12:43 04 Oct 24
Jessy was amazing, picked up the call in midnight on the first bell, came before time and did all the inspections and explained everything well.It was great getting a service from him. Thanks for being our saviour Jessy🙂
kawal deep
02:09 03 Oct 24
I had a mice problem and called other companies but AIO responded right away and came to address the problem. The team was punctual, professional, and extremely knowledgeable. They took the time to explain the process and the products they used, ensuring my family and pets would be safe. It’s been 2 weeks and the problem is completely gone. I feel like I received great value for my money. Would definitely recommend to others.
Christine Rampersaud
14:53 27 Sep 24
All in one pest control is the company you should contact for excellent service. Jessy did an amazing job, he explained the procedure thoroughly. The service was fast, reliable and perfectly done! This was my third time using All in One Pest Control.Thank you Jessy!
darshan kapadia
01:42 27 Sep 24
Jessy was amazing. These guys really know what they are doing and they arrived at our convenient time which is amazing. Very clear communication and their service is top notch as he even did us a favour to seal the opening where the mice were coming from. He even took time to put the device in attic as well. I am writing this review after week and I am glad to inform that no mice has been found withing our home. Hoping for the same moving forward.
Suba Para
01:54 27 Aug 24
Hi,We received an amazing service today by All in One Pest Control! He explained the process calmly, answering any question we had without hesitation. He is very knowledgeable and also cares about his clients. His punctuality is exceptional as we called late but he came within an hour! He answered all of our concerns and explained the process thoroughly! Furthermore, the price was great for the hard work and effort he puts in. He investigated the situation properly and ensured the work was done neatly!I highly recommend All in One Pest Control! He is amazing and gets the job done perfectly! Thank you!
Melanie Pedersen
16:51 10 Aug 24
Jessy was fantastic to work with! He was responsive and on time. He listened to our concerns with empathy and was clearly very knowledgeable. He found and addressed exterior openings where mice were likely getting into our home and used a proprietary product to fend off any more intruders. He also did a thorough inspection of both the interior and exterior and set poison traps inside with great care and placement consideration because we have a dog in the house. Would highly recommend his services to anyone looking for pest control support!
[/et_pb_code][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
